BlackCave.text: Bats! Hundreds of them! Pass a Speed (-1) check to get out of the cave safely. If you fail, lose 1 stamina.

Graveyard.text: Descending into a dark mausoleum, you discover a vampire rising to feed. You quickly find yourself fighting for your life. Make a Combat (-2) check. If you pass, you defeat the vampire, gaining 1 Clue token and drawing 1 Unique Item. If you fail, roll a die and lose that much Stamina.

GeneralStore.text: The shopkeeper notices one of the items you"re carrying and his face lights up. "Say, I"ve been looking for one of those. You wouldn"t mind parting with it, would ya? I can pay well." You may sell any of your Common Items for twice its listed price.
